resources.description:
If exists an order with the code specified in the URL, in the orders of the logged-in customer, returns this order information.


If the access token at header is invalid, returns a response with status 401.

```response:200
{
	"order": {
		"code": "29686420-27cb-440d-9345-65c4dba8d295",
		"status": "P",
		"price": "425.00",
		"date": "2023-03-28",
		"customer": "customer0@gmail.com",
		"shipping_address": {
			"id": 10,
			"street_name": "rua teste",
			"house_number": 10,
			"city": "Salvador",
			"state": "BA"
		},
		"order_items": [
			{
				"book": {
					"ISBN": "2400221501609",
					"title": "title",
					"author": "author",
					"publication_year": 2012,
					"language": "pt-BR",
					"publisher": "publisher",
					"genres": [
						"Food & Drink"
					],
					"number_of_pages": 289,
					"price": "107.00",
					"discount": "0.00",
					"cover_url": "/images/default_book_cover.jpg",
					"views": 550,
					"sellings": 1
				},
				"quantity": 1,
				"price": "107.00"
			},
			{
				"book": {
					"ISBN": "4127474808839",
					"title": "title",
					"author": "author",
					"publication_year": 1981,
					"language": "es-ES",
					"publisher": "publisher",
					"genres": [
						"Action & Adventure",
						"Fantasy"
					],
					"number_of_pages": 541,
					"price": "106.00",
					"discount": "0.00",
					"cover_url": "/images/default_book_cover.jpg",
					"views": 0,
					"sellings": 3
				},
				"quantity": 3,
				"price": "106.00"
			}
		]
	}
}
```

```response:401
{
	"detail": "Given token not valid for any token type",
	"code": "token_not_valid",
	"messages": [
		{
			"token_class": "AccessToken",
			"token_type": "access",
			"message": "Token is invalid or expired"
		}
	]
}
```

```response:401
{ 
	"detail": "Unauthorized access" 
}
```

```response:404
{
	"detail": "Order not found"
}
```

resources.description:
If it exists, returns the book that has the ISBN specified in the URL.
 
 ```response:200
{
	"book": {
		"ISBN": "2960421593270",
		"title": "title",
		"author": "author",
		"publication_year": 1966,
		"language": "Portuguese (Brazil)",
		"publisher": "publisher",
		"genres": [
			"Action & Adventure"
		],
		"number_of_pages": 316,
		"price": "142.00",
		"cover_url": "/images/default_book_cover.jpg"
	}
}
```

```response:404
{
	"detail": "Book not found"
}
```
